title: The Week of Ling Wood: Editing Justice
summary: Ling Wood discovers his supernatural editing powers, using them to expose corruption and crime in his city over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Ling Wood entdeckt seine übernatürlichen Bearbeitungskräfte, mit denen er Korruption und Verbrechen in seiner Stadt im Laufe einer Woche aufdeckt.
summaryDutch: Ling Wood ontdekt zijn bovennatuurlijke bewerkingskrachten, waarmee hij corruptie en misdaad in zijn stad gedurende een week blootlegt.
summaryFrench: Ling Wood découvre ses pouvoirs de montage surnaturels, qu'il utilise pour exposer la corruption et le crime dans sa ville au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Ling Wood sits at his desk, editing late-night crime footage. Unexpectedly, the screen flickers and he suddenly sees crimes happening in real-time. Shocked and intrigued, he marks down the events to investigate.
Using his editing skills, Ling enhances the videos, identifying the criminals. He tips off the local police anonymously, leading to several arrests.
Emboldened by his successes, Ling Wood publishes a video compilation of unresolved crimes, appealing to the public for information. His channel gains unexpected popularity.

Despite growing recognition, Ling feels a deep sadness. He recognizes that his city is more corrupt than he imagined. Determined, he continues his nighttime training routines, building both physical and mental strength.
A corrupt official tries to intimidate Ling into stopping his investigations. Undeterred, Ling uses this confrontation as content for a new viral video, exposing the official.
With corruption exposed, Ling enjoys a peaceful walk in the park. He meets an old friend who praises his bravery, sparking a new feeling of romance.
Ling's story culminates in a large public gathering thanking him. He feels victorious and hopeful, realizing he’s inspired others to act against injustice.

ending: As Ling Wood watched the city's sun set, he knew his journey was not over, but that he had changed his city forever.
moral: The power of truth and determination can transform darkness into light.
